title: Onmic
description: A voice-streaming platform towards barrier-free expression and authentic connection through voice

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation

As the first audio application developed by Vietnamese people, OnMic provides the ability to create live chat rooms (voice-streaming), with interaction between speakers and listeners. Instead of using text, photos, or videos as a means of communication, OnMic allows people to "gather" in audio chat rooms to listen and talk about a variety of topics. Here, users can build relationships with friends and colleagues quickly with just a smartphone without spending any money.

> ## Tech Stack Used

<TechStack
  className='text-3xl'
  data={['nextjs', 'redux', 'agora', 'mantine', 'tailwind', 'apollo']}
/>

- Agora: Buid live stream real-time audio sytem.
- Redux: Manage global state
- Mantine + TailwindCSS: build components faster and easy to customize
- Apollo: fetch data from api (Graphql) and handle response with cache

> ## Features

<hr />

> ## Lessons Learned

This is the first project that i had worked in a product company. I experienced the process of making a technology product, then maintaining and fixing bugs.

We are keep track of everything in Trello and assign the task on that app. It is
really fun working with a lot of people and try bunch of new ideas and communicate
our differences. I also learned a lot about developing a website with a bunch of
floating illustrations and absolutely-positioned elements. I usually avoid making
designs with illustrations that are absolutely-positioned

  width={800}
  height={550}
/>
